Ortiz injured in win

The early prognosis on David Ortiz's sore right Achilles' tendon is that he may have to sit out a few days. An MRI is scheduled for later today. (Boston Globe)

With forecasters expecting today's temperatures to near or even shatter Boston's record for the day, residents are urged to drink water and limit outdoor activity. (Globe)
